title: New skin thought
body: I was wandering if there was going to be a candie Kayn skin and if its not being made it probably should.{{champion:141}}

replies.body: You have no idea how much I raged about this very same idea. Opportunity missed this year, but hopefully, we get some punny skins like this one next holiday xD!
I'm waiting on some Xmas Thresh skin... e.g  Krampus Thresh
